build.script:
#!/bin/sh
cd placepress-blocks
npm run build
echo "Copying to SVN trunk..."
rsync -a ../../placepress/ ~/SVN/trunk/ --exclude node_modules
echo "Copying to SVN \"next\" tag..."
rsync -a ../../placepress/ ~/SVN/tags/next --exclude node_modules --exclude '.*'
echo "Opening SVN directory...\n\n"
open ~/SVN
